question: For resistance to Erlotinib in Lung Cancer, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Erlotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ponatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ponatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Ponatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Asparaginase')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Asparaginase'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Asparaginase')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Asparaginase')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In Renal Cell Carcinoma, what therapies target genes linked to resistance to Pazopanib?
cypher:

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pazopanib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pazopanib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (

  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pazopanib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which treatments target resistance biomarkers for Thioguanine in B-lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Thioguanine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Thioguanine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Thioguanine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Thioguanine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Selumetinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:

WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('PI3Ka/Di')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PI3Ka/Di'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('PI3Ka/Di')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'her2-receptor' AND

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'

WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Lonafarnib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lonafarnib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lonafarnib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Lonafarnib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma, what therapies target genes linked to resistance to Entrectinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Entrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Entrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Entrectinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Entrectinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lenalidomide'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lenalidomide')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'multiple' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloma'
  )

  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Lenalidomide')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

RETURN

LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Nilotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,

question: For resistance to Selumetinib in Naevocarcinoma, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Selumetinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Enzalutamide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Enzalutamide'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Enzalutamide')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Enzalutamide')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Erlotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('PI-103')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In Colonic Carcinoma, what therapies target genes linked to resistance to Pembrolizumab?

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pembrolizumab')

question: In Ca Head Of Pancreas, what therapies target genes linked to resistance to Trametinib?

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Trametinib')

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Palbociclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Palbociclib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Palbociclib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Palbociclib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Pemetrexed in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Pemetrexed')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pemetrexed'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pemetrexed')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'

  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pemetrexed')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which treatments target resistance biomarkers for Pemetrexed in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Pemetrexed')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pemetrexed'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pemetrexed')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pemetrexed')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Sorafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sorafenib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sorafenib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Sorafenib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Dasatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Afatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Axitinib')

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Fulvestrant')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fulvestrant'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fulvestrant')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Fulvestrant')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Paclitaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Paclitaxel'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Paclitaxel')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Paclitaxel')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Picoplatin'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Picoplatin')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Picoplatin')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Fluorouracil')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,

LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Ceritinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ceritinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ceritinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Ceritinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find alternative therapies targeting resistance genes for Anti-EGFR Monoclonal Antibody in Colorectal Cancer.
cypher:

)

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Anti-EGFR Monoclonal Antibody')

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))

)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Dasatinib')

question: Find alternative therapies targeting resistance genes for Nilotinib in CML - Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Nilotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Nilotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
